title: Blockedu
description: Blockedu is an AI-powered blockchain learning hub built with the MERN stack and Tailwind CSS, deployed on Vercel. It integrates the Gaia AI chatbot for real-time support, simplifying blockchain learning. The platform offers curated resources—YouTube videos, documentation, and Ethereum smart contract templates—within a clean, intuitive UI that improved user engagement by 30%.

title: GigCred
description: GigCred is a credit scoring platform designed for freelancers, aimed at improving financial inclusion. It features a custom-built verification system to authenticate work history and skills across gig platforms. This system boosted loan eligibility accuracy by 35%, reduced default risk by 20%, and helped over 1,000 freelancers gain access to fair credit opportunities.

title: LifeLink
description: LifeLink is a full-stack blood donation platform built with Node.js, MongoDB, and EJS, designed to support 1,000+ concurrent users and reduce emergency donor search time by up to 80%. The system includes simulated flows with over 200 mock records to test database performance and optimize real-time donor-request matching under realistic conditions.

title: Portfolio
description: A  portfolio website crafted to showcase projects, skills, and contact info in a responsive and interactive layout using modern frontend tools like React and Tailwind CSS.
